short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Play Temple of Boom Original as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!

short.fil: I-play ang Temple of Boom Original bilang isang Chrome extension - Maaari rin itong laruin nang walang internet, subukan ito ngayon!

short.ja: クロム拡張機能としてTemple of Boom Originalをプレイする - インターネットなしでもプレイできます、今すぐ試してみてください！
short.ko: 크롬 확장 프로그램으로 Temple of Boom Original을 플레이해 보세요 - 또한 인터넷없이도 플레이할 수 있습니다. 지금 바로 시도해 보세요!

short.ru: Играйте в оригинальный Temple of Boom в виде расширения для Chrome - также можно играть без интернета, попробуйте сейчас!
short.sk: Play Temple of Boom Original as a Chrome extension - Also, it can be played without internet. Try it now!
short.sr: Покрени изворни предложак игре Temple of Boom као Chrome додатак - Такође можете играти без интернета, покушајте одмах!

short.th: เล่น Temple of Boom ต้นฉบับเป็นส่วนขยายของ Chrome - ยังสามารถเล่นได้โดยไม่ต้องเชื่อมต่ออินเทอร์เน็ตด้วย ลองเล่นเดี๋ยวนี้!

short.vi: Phát trò chơi Temple of Boom Original như một tiện ích Chrome - Cũng có thể chơi mà không cần kết nối Internet, hãy thử ngay bây…
short.zh_CN: 作为 Chrome 扩展程序，播放《炸弹神庙》原版 - 也可以在没有互联网的情况下进行游戏，现在来试试吧！
short.zh_TW: 在 Chrome 擴充功能中播放 Temple of Boom 原版 - 也可以離線播放，立即試試看！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌋 Temple of Boom: Explosive Multiplayer Mayhem! 🚀💥

Dive into the heart-pounding world of Temple of Boom, an exhilarating multiplayer shooting game that promises explosive battles, intense firefights, and pixelated chaos! 🎮 Developed by Colin Lane Games, this action-packed title combines vibrant pixel art with a variety of game modes, offering players a wild ride filled with explosions and thrilling moments.

🔫 Game Controls:

Arrow Keys or WASD: Move your character.
Mouse: Aim your weapon.
Left Mouse Button: Unleash a barrage of bullets on your enemies.
Spacebar: Jump to dodge obstacles and reach higher platforms.
Number Keys: Switch between a diverse array of weapons.
🎮 How to Play:

Choose Your Character: Select a character and customize your loadout before entering the explosive battleground.
Engage in Multiplayer Battles: Join the chaos of multiplayer matches or challenge AI opponents in various game modes.
Collect Power-ups: Grab power-ups and discover new weapons scattered across the map to gain a crucial advantage.
Survive and Eliminate Opponents: Evade enemy fire, stay alive, and eliminate opponents to rack up points for your team.
Teamwork and Strategy: Collaborate with your teammates, devise clever strategies, and dominate the battlefield to emerge as the ultimate victors.
Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping experience where every explosion, every shot, and every jump matters. Temple of Boom is not just a game; it's an explosive journey into the world of multiplayer mayhem! 💣🔥


Discover extra gaming options by looking in the upper-left area of the screen.
